hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base

Interface ConnectableObservable<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the element type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Observable<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultConnectableObservable

    public interface ConnectableObservable<T>
extends Observable<T>
    An observable which can be connected, reconnected or disconnected to a source observable.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.03.21.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Closeable connect()
      Connects the wrapper to its source.

      • Methods inherited from interface hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Observable

        register

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        Closeable connect()
        Connects the wrapper to its source. All registered observers will receive values while this connection is active. Closing the connection will stop the observers from receiving events, but they won't be deregistered. Connecting to an already connected source is a no-op.
        Returns:
        the handler to close the connection
